Test Name: Panel to Whole Exome Sequencing Reflex Test
Purpose: To generate accurate sequencing data and identify genetic variants by performing targeted gene panel sequencing with reflex to whole exome sequencing when needed.
Container: Blood: EDTA (purple top) or Streck tube; Saliva: approved collection kit; Tissue: fresh/flash-frozen container or FFPE block
Equipment: DNA extraction kits, Qubit or NanoDrop quantification instruments, Agilent Bioanalyzer, Illumina MiSeq/HiSeq sequencer, bioinformatics software (e.g., BWA, GATK)
